system.availability: Infected Character cannot remove Fatigue. Whenever gaining Fatigue everyone in 1d10 metres is exposed to disease. If character becomes unconcious due to Fatigue whilst infected, they die. Cured with a week of constant rest, at end make +20 Toughness Test, if fail gain 1 Fatigue.
system.cost:
Acquired in batch of 5. Any exposed to disease must make +0 Toughness Test or catch it.
Nurgle Dedicated can carry disease but are immune to effects.
